FAQ's

What are the benefits of Selenex GSH?

Selenex GSH uses three key ingredients to Age Better and increase longevity.

  • Promote longevity and general well-being
  • Rejuvenate cells by raising glutathione level
  • Protect cells from harmful free radicals
  • Support immune health
  • Support liver detoxification processes
  • Maintain cognitive function
  • Maintain healthy vision
  • Support youthful skin appearance
What is Glutathione?

Glutathione is an antioxidant that is capable of preventing damage to important cellular components caused by reactive oxygen species such as free radicals, peroxides, lipid peroxides, and heavy metals.

Restoring your glutathione level may have the below benefits:

  • Help keep cells healthy and restore robust health.
  • Provide cellular protection against free radicals.
  • Support the body’s own natural ability to rid itself of toxins.
  • Promote liver and immune system function.
  • Helps with longevity and a whole-body feeling of health and youth.
  • Supports a healthy prostate, heart, lung and colon.
Is Selenex GSH Gluten Free?

Yes! Selenex GSH is free fromgluten, soy, dairy and is Non-GMO!

How do I take Selenex GSH and in what dosage?

Take 2 capsules of Selenex GSH once daily or as directed by your healthcare provider. Each bottle contains a 30-day supply.

Will Selenex GSH interact with medications I'm taking?

Selenex GSH is an all-natural formula, made from ingredients that have been deemed to be safe. However, as with any dietary supplement, you should consult a physician before adding any supplement to your routine.
